title: Paths in Rust Module Tree
description: In this lab, we learn that paths are used in Rust to refer to items in the module tree, and can take the form of absolute paths or relative paths.

meta.title: Paths in Rust Module Tree: Mastering Absolute and Relative Paths
meta.description: Explore the intricacies of Rust's module system and learn how to effectively use absolute and relative paths to refer to items within your crate.
meta.keywords: rust playground, paths, relative, module, rust online compiler, rust tutor, absolute, rust commands, rust practice, rust online
